IDEA BEHIND AURZA

We founded AURZA out of a frustration of never being able to find the clothes we really wanted. After having six kids, clothes shopping had lost its sparkle, left us deflated and there was always a compromise – too short, too baggy, too expensive or even too plain.
we want everyone to be able to step out with confidence day and night

So our aim is simple - to allow women like us to create extraordinary clothes that reflect their own sense of style whilst both flattering and fitting each of our unique bodies. We want everyone to be able to step out with confidence day and night, feeling a million dollars and we know from personal experience that a great outfit can make all the difference.

We are starting by offering utterly fabulous custom made dresses and separates designed by us and perfected by you. You choose the style and simply change the bodice, skirt, sleeves, length, fabric, trims and accessories.

Once you have experienced custom from the comfort of your own home you will always want to feel this good.

Steph and Jess

MEET THE TEAM

Stephanie Holland

Founder and Commerical Director

With fifteen years commercial experience Steph has developed our international supply chain to ensure we offer high quality, value for money pieces that exceed our consumers’ expectations whilst offering the just in time service we require.

Jessica Stephens

Founder and Creative Director

With twelve years of textiles and design experience Jess has lead the way with the creative development of the range. Aiming to create classic designs that are jaw droppingly gorgeous, Jess has worked closely with our 3D pattern and manufacturing experts and spent years researching the perfect silhouettes and fabrics that both flatter and fit and quite frankly just make you feel great.
